name: ノイズ
message: "Hey, snap out of it!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Look, just forget about me... Get out while you can..."

name: ノイズ
message: "Don't lose your shit now! C'mon! Get your ass off the floor!"
Noiz grabs my arm to pull me up.
But I'm...
He's...

name: 蒼葉
message: "There's no time... Hurry! You need to get out!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Ngh!"
I yank my arm free from his grasp, quashing the urge to apologize.
I hope this'll make him leave.
As long as he gets out, nothing else matters.
But Noiz...
He scowls, staring at his hand.
And then, he grasps it with his other hand.
...What?
That gesture...

name: ノイズ
message: "...Yeah."
For the first time, Noiz glares at me with eyes full of fury.

name: ノイズ
message: "It hurts. Because of you."

name: ノイズ
message: "Because you used Scrap on me... because you pulled me out of my world, I can feel things again."

name: ノイズ
message: "It's your fault. And you think you can just abandon me?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But... my power... I might lose control... and I won't be able to regain it..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I might destroy everyone... even you..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Just... leave me..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Agh!"

name: ノイズ
message: "...It hurts. Hitting you hurts me too. It's like all the pain I never felt is coming to me now. That's your fault. How you gonna take responsibility?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Maybe you're gonna lose control, I don't know. But whatever happens, I'll deal with it. I'll find a way."

name: ノイズ
message: "It's your power that destroyed my world... and let me feel again."

name: ノイズ
message: "So it can't be bad. At least... not to me."

name: ノイズ
message: "Whatever happens to you now, I'll figure something out. So let's get outta here together. Alright?"
Noiz wraps an arm around my shoulder. I rise with his support.
When he hit me, I felt something warm bloom inside me.
And oddly enough, my headache is gone.
His presence... is fading too.

name: ノイズ
message: "...You know."
Noiz speaks as we make our way to the door.

name: ノイズ
message: "I think I kinda know what you meant now."

name: ノイズ
message: "That thing... about wanting to help people when they're hurt. I guess that comes from knowing what pain is like."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Yeah."
The warmth in my chest grows stronger.
